article: My friend Tony is an American  _  . He is ten years old. He lives  _  his family in China now. There are  _  people in his family; his mother Mrs. Green, his father Mr. Green and his little sister Amy. He has a white cat.  _  name is Betty. Look!Amy is playing  _  Betty. His father, Mr. Green, is watching TV. His mother is doing housework. What about Tony? He is doing  _  Chinese homework. He can't  _  Chinese well, but he likes Chinese very much. Tony's  _  works in a TV station. His father works in a school as an  _  teacher. Tony and his sister  go  to the same school.
